\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[44f492a355eb74dcd03bf1dff7b05dec]%mdk
$X_i \stackrel{i.i.d}{\sim} \text{DUnif}(1,|D|)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={64}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[4509ba72f08a49104f5e76bc3af0ff63]%mdk
$X = \max_{i=1}^N\{ X_i \}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={65}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[f564e7c6618bc2c0c99eae5a9376fbaf]%mdk
$E[X]$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={65}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a97118fb9e8d7e006a466bfc0771f888]%mdk
$X_i$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={65}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[8a4286be42af90b937700faa6847e045]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={67}
\Pr[X_i \leq k ] = \frac{k}{|D|}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={69}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk
$X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={69}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[11e352e53743beda1ae9b0bda4203c9a]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={71}
\begin{aligned}
\Pr[X \leq k-1] + \Pr[X \geq k+1] + \Pr[X = k] &= 1 \\
\implies \Pr[X = k] &= 1 - \Pr[X \leq k - 1] - \Pr[X \geq k + 1] \\
&= \Pr[X \leq k] - \Pr[X \leq k - 1] \\
&= (\Pr[X_i \leq k])^n - (\Pr[X_i \leq k - 1])^n \\
&= \frac{k^N - (k-1)^N}{|D|}    
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={79}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[a610ec1f38d940741f1cc8f6adc5daf5]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={81}
\begin{aligned}
E[X] &= \sum_{k=1}^{|D|} k \frac{k^N - (k-1)^N}{|D|}   \\
&= \frac{1}{|D|} \sum_{k=1}^{|D|} k^{N+1} - k(k-1)^N 
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={87}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[151cc95763e6626469d2388779b1dfb1]%mdk
$Y_i \stackrel{i.i.d}{\sim} \text{Unif}(0,|D|)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={88}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7ea1c95d837e9dd88cc0db9406dededf]%mdk
$X_i = \lceil Y_i \rceil$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk

$Y_i$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={89}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a97118fb9e8d7e006a466bfc0771f888]%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[7041b92d3f049de9ae4ecae26dde9884]%mdk
$X = \max_i \{X_i \} = \max_i \{ \lceil Y_i \rceil \} = \lceil \max_i \{ Y_i \} \rceil$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={91}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[36298d004a51fab401cc12f3bcabc389]%mdk
$Y = \max \{Y_i \}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={91}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[57cec4137b614c87cb4e24a3d003a3e0]%mdk
$Y$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={91}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk
$X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={92}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[57cec4137b614c87cb4e24a3d003a3e0]%mdk
$Y$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={92}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[762c0f38c71ffa6e93f0a1daab55ab04]%mdk
$Y_i$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={92}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a6e1202098708f2b56d6b66ef2446eec]%mdk
$F_{Y_i}(y) = \frac{y}{|D|}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={92}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[ab37370794bc79b4d289bf0e0fa0e1e1]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={94}
\begin{aligned}
F_Y(y) &= F_{Y_i}(y)^N \\
&= \frac{y^n}{|D|^N}
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={99}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[c37375cf02808e495c89947f18ae1c4c]%mdk
$f_Y(y) = \frac{Ny^{N-1}}{|D|^N}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={99}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[d074e26716da8c72f890fa3bf5a319a3]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={102}
\begin{aligned}
E[Y] &= \frac{N}{|D|^N} \int_0^{|D|} y^n \\
&= \frac{N}{(N+1)|D|^N}y^{n+1} \biggr|_0^{|D|}\\
&= \frac{N}{N+1}|D|
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={108}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[8d9c307cb7f3c4a32822a51922d1ceaa]%mdk

\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[35d4ea104defbc7acfd24ab99a1a9f23]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={110}
E[X] \approx |D| 
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

%mdk-data-line={126}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[eca91c83a74a2373ca5f796700e99fd3]%mdk
$p_i$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={127}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[f5bd1f3fba2c9619351224775ea350e7]%mdk
$E[X_i] = \frac{|D| + 1}{2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={127}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[973a73a04d54f2a8dfec1aab886dc957]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={129}
E[X] = \sum_{i=1}^N E[X_i] = \sum_{i=1}^N \frac{|D| + 1}{2} = \frac{N(|D| + 1)}{2} 
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={134}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e406ac4d7c470823a8619c13dd7101be]%mdk
$s_i$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={139}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[9f901a90526ab3321433f9bab1b0da9d]%mdk
$N << 2^{n/2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={140}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e406ac4d7c470823a8619c13dd7101be]%mdk
$s_i$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={141}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e406ac4d7c470823a8619c13dd7101be]%mdk
$s_i$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={143}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[25e1a0e76df451244c5edd977ce39d96]%mdk
$N >> 2^{n/2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={145}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b44ed3606f9b2387a9f43341b2638551]%mdk
$E(X)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={145}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[af48557b1c4fda1319ecdac77d6e45c5]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={147}
|D| \leq E(X) \leq \frac{N(|D| + 1)}{2} 
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[31b2c3b0622c2efa20fa73857177dba6]%mdk
$H_{\infty}(X) \leq 5$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={205}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk
$X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={205}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[39a70579daef6eaf952a8874edbd5383]%mdk
$\zo^\ell$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={206}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[5cd7198821988bf0e239621fd4466fa3]%mdk
$2^{-c_2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={206}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[ed7d748052323d008cdd7bbb736ed1e3]%mdk
$x' \in \zo^\ell$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={206}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[bedc8403961a0ebcc00959288a4b9c3f]%mdk
$1 - 2^{-c_2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={207}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[000c6349bceb1ce0e442f00ba2f4c4ac]%mdk
$S \subset \zo^\ell \setminus \{x'\}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={207}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b9e06a7f6d4241b8c2508687144fe331]%mdk
$|S| = 2^{c_1 \ell}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={208}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[74061bce552cd94a5614e6ab93e35ecb]%mdk
$c_1 \geq 0, c_2 \in [0,1]$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={208}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[ca6897abdf9a1f8de24a27121aaa8534]%mdk
$x \in (\zo^l \setminus S) \setminus \{x'\}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={209}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[58a665edfa8b8c29dc2d25c3da147886]%mdk
$2^{-c_2} \geq \frac{1-2^{-c_2}}{|S|} \implies2^{-c_2} \geq \frac{1}{1 + |S|} \implies c_2 \leq -\log \frac{1}{1 + |S|} \implies c_2 \leq \log(1 + 2^{c_1 \ell})$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={214}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[71f0427a673c14326195285a092cc63a]%mdk
$c_2$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={214}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[faac10b06c21bf3b33321bc918aea69b]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={217}
\begin{aligned}
H_{\infty}(X) &= \min_x \left\{\log \frac{1}{\Pr[X = x]} \right\} \\
&= \log \frac{1}{\Pr[X = x']} \\
&= \log 2^{c_2} \\
&= c_2
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={225}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[30b94bbbad526eeb6dd345afdaeaccf8]%mdk
$x'$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={226}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[5cd7198821988bf0e239621fd4466fa3]%mdk
$2^{-c_2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={226}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[efbbda458a0e45d95b0e2e6ad6fd4dba]%mdk
$\frac{1-2^{-c_2}}{|S|}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={226}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[1e9c20ee45cd2691a89c5a350d07b122]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={230}
\begin{aligned}
H_{Shannon}(X) &= \sum_{x \in X} \Pr[X = x] \log \frac{1}{\Pr[X = x]} \\
&= 2^{-c_2}c_2 + \sum_{x \in S}\frac{1-2^{-c_2}}{|S|} \log \frac{|S|}{1 - 2^{-c_2}} \\
&= 2^{-c_2}c_2 + \frac{1-2^{-c_2}}{|S|} [\log(|S|) - \log (1 - 2^{-c_2})] \sum_{x \in S} 1 \\
&= 2^{-c_2}c_2 + (1-2^{c_2})(c_1\ell - \log(1 - 2^{-c_2}))
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={237}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[576f1dacd615219d9f8bea06b26d5fdc]%mdk
$c_1$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={237}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[71f0427a673c14326195285a092cc63a]%mdk
$c_2$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={237}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[bf501b182861bed770b44e4856a46a48]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={239}
\begin{aligned}
1 \leq c_2 &\leq 5 \\
c_1 &\geq \frac{1}{50}
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={244}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[fce3e5b755b34ed858f65f398efdaa4f]%mdk
$H_{\infty}(X) = c_2 \leq 5$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={244}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[9f17e6208479f4395000aa1b3088dff3]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={246}
\begin{aligned}
H_{Shannon}(X) &= \frac{1}{2^{c_2}} + (1 - \frac{1}{2^{c_2}})[c_1 \ell - \log [1 - \frac{1}{2^{c_2}}]] \\
&\geq \frac{1}{2}c_1 \ell \\
&\geq \frac{1}{100}\ell
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={252}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[b73d4c2b9f6b6c69b4e891832e5e1337]%mdk
$1- \frac{1}{2^{c_2}}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={253}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[93b05c90d14a117ba52da1d743a43ab1]%mdk
$\frac{1}{2}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={253}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[c406c0aca174a2a47b7c4b8269641094]%mdk
$c_1\ell - \log[1-\frac{1}{2^{c_2}}]$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={253}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[56280c25a4c2247f78c8b0e2c0566049]%mdk
$c_1\ell$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={255}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[ce1d66b0675d0ee90f4075d9eee0aaba]%mdk
$X \over \zo^{10n}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={255}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[2ffcad948ed8eb88657fd97cc2aaef72]%mdk
$H_{\infty}(X)\leq 5$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={255}

\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[8c79bf3f6820aa4386861da0dc016bac]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={261}
\Pr[X = x'] = \frac{1}{2^5}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={263}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[ad86259271205dc367d93741f2a33c47]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={265}
\begin{aligned}
H_{\infty}(X) = \min_x \{\log \frac{1}{\Pr[X = x]} \} = 5 \\
\implies \exists x' \text{ st. } \log \frac{1}{\Pr[X= x']} = 5 \\
\implies  \exists x' \text{ st. } \Pr[X = x'] = \frac{1}{2^5}
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk

%mdk-data-line={291}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[ab44419ef62dd7f368f846396a204358]%mdk
$\frac{1}{2} + negl(n)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={293}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[b6fee8a3e1dfe99340421576ce2be590]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={295}
\begin{aligned}
\Pr[b' = b] &= \Pr[b' = b \mid X = x']\Pr[X = x'] + \Pr[b' = b \mid X \neq x']\Pr[X \neq x'] \\
&= (1)\frac{1}{2^5} + [\frac{1}{2} + negl(n)]\frac{2^5 - 1}{2^5} \\
&= \frac{1}{2} + \frac{2^5 - 1}{2^5}negl(n) + \frac{1}{2^6} \\
&= \frac{1}{2} + p(n)
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={302}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[e56bcce50c2b511fdb1a42199a17e643]%mdk
$p(n)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={302}

\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[57cec4137b614c87cb4e24a3d003a3e0]%mdk
$Y$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={315}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk
$X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={315}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[57cec4137b614c87cb4e24a3d003a3e0]%mdk
$Y$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={315}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[5867c9b098884eca2779f6d98d4b0b29]%mdk
$\zo^n$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={315}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[bac14eaf331514cde7d39d0068583fc7]%mdk
$H_{\infty}(X \oplus Y) \geq \max \{ H_{\infty}(X) , H_{\infty}(Y) \}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={315}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[656eeb30f403648af1adf9d6444c84b0]%mdk
$X\oplus Y$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={315}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[96eb03a6e185092bf6157c8d9516ad5e]%mdk
$x\getsr X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={315}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[01f76e562747b02b19054dc83c792eea]%mdk
$y\getsr Y$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={315}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[788b7b4e233a635727354ee010f52e3d]%mdk
$x\oplus y$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={317}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[24dea2d51150eb48fc7b49f49faacf73]%mdk
$X \oplus Y$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={317}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[457eaf23d849b1445624ab0fb6b30959]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={321}
\begin{aligned}
H_{\infty}(X \oplus Y) &= \min_z \left\{\log \frac{1}{\Pr[X \oplus Y = z]} \right\} \\
&= \log \min_z \left\{ \frac{1}{\Pr[X \oplus Y = z]}\right\} \\
&= \log \frac{1}{\max_z \left\{ \Pr[X \oplus Y = z]\right\}}
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={327}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[b0512d1763e20b75159c9b0d09b4d714]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={329}
H_{\infty}(X) = \log \frac{1}{\max_x \left\{ \Pr[X = x] \right\}}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={331}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a2e0cdcb291fabffd357d7e9c08bf8e7]%mdk
$H_{\infty}(X \oplus Y) \geq H_{\infty}(X)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={332}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[4ae5fafe7f34b5a3cccbfe63b27c1e75]%mdk
$\max_z \left\{ \Pr[X \oplus Y = z]\right\} \leq  \max_x \left\{ \Pr[X = x] \right\}$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={333}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[57cec4137b614c87cb4e24a3d003a3e0]%mdk
$Y$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={333}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[d38a62babce4e64197fa771f0b835fb8]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={335}
\begin{aligned}
\max_z \left\{ \Pr[X \oplus Y = z]\right\} &= \max_z \left\{ \sum_y \Pr[X \oplus y = z \mid Y=y]\Pr[Y = y]\right\} \\
&= \max_z \left\{ \sum_y \Pr[X = z \oplus y \mid Y=y]\Pr[Y = y]\right\} \\
&\leq \max_z \left\{ \sum_y  \max_x \left\{ \Pr[X = x] \right\} \Pr[Y = y]\right\} \\
&= \max_x \left\{ \Pr[X = x] \right\} \max_z \left\{ \sum_y \Pr[Y = y]\right\} \\
&= \max_x \left\{ \Pr[X = x] \right\}
\end{aligned} 
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={343}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[a2e0cdcb291fabffd357d7e9c08bf8e7]%mdk
$H_{\infty}(X \oplus Y) \geq H_{\infty}(X)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={344}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[ee44d83c65649b6b29eb500880568b3e]%mdk
$H_{\infty}(X \oplus Y) \geq H_{\infty}(X \oplus Y \mid Y) = H_{\infty}(X)$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={346}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[57cec4137b614c87cb4e24a3d003a3e0]%mdk
$Y$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={346}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk
$X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={347}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[57cec4137b614c87cb4e24a3d003a3e0]%mdk
$Y$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={347}
\begin{mdDisplaySnippet}[e9737aced98832e6c26a57e3433c0120]%mdk
\[%mdk-data-line={349}
\begin{aligned}
H_{\infty}(X \oplus Y) &\geq H_{\infty}(X) \\
H_{\infty}(X \oplus Y) &\geq H_{\infty}(Y) \\
\implies H_{\infty}(X \oplus Y) &\geq \max \{ H_{\infty}(X), H_{\infty}(Y)\}
\end{aligned}
\]%mdk
\end{mdDisplaySnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={356}
\begin{mdInlineSnippet}[02129bb861061d1a052c592e2dc6b383]%mdk
$X$\end{mdInlineSnippet}%mdk
%mdk-data-line={356}

%mdk-data-line={356}
